## 🎯 Impact

**Severity:**
- [ ] Low - Minor inconvenience
- [ ] Medium - Significant impact on functionality
- [ ] High - Major feature broken
- [ ] Critical - System unusable

**Frequency:**
- [ ] Rare - Happens occasionally
- [ ] Common - Happens frequently
- [ ] Always - Happens every time
